org.spf4j.concurrent

Class FileBasedLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.concurrent.FileBasedLock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Lock

    public final class FileBasedLock
extends Object
implements Lock, Closeable
    File based Lock implementation, that can be used as IPC method.
    Author:
    zoly

    • Method Detail

      • extractPosixPermissions

        public static Set<PosixFilePermission> extractPosixPermissions(FileAttribute<?>[] fileAttributes)

      • getLock

        public static FileBasedLock getLock(File lockFile,
                                    FileAttribute<?>... fileAttributes)
                             throws IOException
        Returns a FileBasedLock implementation. FileBasedLock will hold onto a File Descriptor during the entire life of the instance. FileBasedLock is a reentrant lock. (it can be acquired multiple times by the same thread)
        Parameters:
        lockFile - the file to lock on.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException
